snippet.title: Guerrilla Gardening Trailer
snippet.description:
Guerrilla Gardening: Tactical Horticulture Simulator is available now on itch.io (pay what you want):

https://randomhuman.itch.io/guerrilla-gardening

Originally developed for the Ludum Dare game jam as a twin-stick shooter/farming sim hybrid, this updated version includes a new enemy, difficulty levels, new art, and full controller support.

Future updates are planned to include a narrative, NPCs, deeper farming gameplay, and multiple city environments to explore and liberate. You can follow the development on itch.io.

If you like my work, please consider supporting me by paying some small amount for the game - any future updates will be available to you for free. Alternatively, you can buy me a coffee (https://ko-fi.com/hyperlinkyourheart).

Check out my website for info on where to see more of my work in the future: https://hyperlinkyourheart.com
